org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.time

Interface GridTime

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AdvanceableTime
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EventDrivenGridTime, SimpleGridTime

    public interface GridTime
    GridTime provides other classes with an abstract idea of time, sometimes called Simulation Time. It is monotonic increasing, but other than that no guarantees are provided about the relationship between this measure of time and "real" time. Copyright (c) 2004 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html
